game.name: Backrooms: Escape Together
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Unreal Engine 5에서 시각적으로 리얼하게 제작된 1~6인 협동 서바이벌 호러 게임입니다. 절차에 따라 생성되는 10개 레벨에서 리미널 환경, 퍼즐, 엔티티를 탐험하세요. 정기적으로 새로운 레벨과 콘텐츠가 추가됩니다. 플레이어는 숨어 있는 것의 손아귀에 있으며 탈출하기 위해 필요한 모든 조치를 취해야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A visually lifelike co-op horror for 1-6 people. Journey through 10 procedurally generated levels, using what's available to survive and progress deeper into the Backrooms.

reviewHighlights.text: Good game, but there's no need to transcribe voices and then keep them on your server for analytics. You can mute your mic to dodge the transcription,...
Game wants to collect transcripts of your voice chats from the game. Impossible to opt out.
